title: South Coast Connection
body:
Greeting Fellow Summoners

I am here to invite people from the South Coast of NSW to join a group based on the region where I live. 

Goals for the group:-
1. Form a team to represent us in the OOL.
2. Meet for group activities in the local area. (Viewing parties for OCE, game reviews for team etc, or even just a bbq.)
3. Set up a gaming facility for members to get together and play.
4. Find something interesting for everyone who wants to be involved. (Example: A B5 player wouldn't make the team, but maybe they could help set up equipment or organize events etc.
5. have fun.

I live in Ulladulla. Anybody interested could you please leave a comment below, so I can find you and add you to the group, or you can just friend request me, I'm on the OCE server most of the time.

replies.body:
You may have read this post and thought, why would I join this guy, he's bronze so obviously knows nothing and has nothing of value to offer.

I have been watching the pro leagues NA,EU, LCK, OCE and some LPL, all stars, and Worlds, MSI for 3-4 years, even watched Ranked Soloq in every division from Challenger to bronze spectating games. This gives me some really valuable knowledge of the game. 

I have a degree in computing graduating from RMIT in 2013 with distinction, and understand Calculus and other complex maths. I would be valuable for people having technical issues with computers and networks, or with helping to setup and maintain a network of computers and other fun computer stuff.

My nephew told me I should have a go at shoutcasting, as I am loud and expressive when I speak and can Identify anything in the game by sight, but I am shy and a bit too sensitive for that I think.

I am 45yo male, retired basically, and League is my main hobby/interest.

As this thread suggests, I am looking to do more, and be even more involved in the League community as a whole. 

Anyway, without ranting too much, that is just a little bit about me.

I dont care so much for your qualifications. My main question is "are you a silly sausage or a cool dude"?

All academic really cause I dont live on the south coast.

But I've often pondered the possibility of IRL meetups in sydney, perhaps for worlds or someshit.
